channel.title: [Renamed] Hover Buttons Slight Problem
channel.description:
Well client's aren't my forte but while building an interface I discovered a problem with my client. Hover buttons only work in sidebar interfaces, not interfaces over the game screen (such as a bank interface). I imagine my pictures will help you to understand my problem better.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dlg8eg.gif[/img] [hr]
[size=14pt]As you can see, when my mouse is over the interface in the upper left the button does not change when I hover over it, but in the sidebar interface it works flawlessly. Not a problem for the clan chat interface because its suppose to be in the sidebar but its just an example.
To generalize the problem:[/size] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4ruyds.png[/img]
Feel free to ask for any code snippets that can help you pinpoint the problem however due to the current state of my client I'd like to refrain from posting entire classes :)
